Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Is this where the last trial takes place?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'North General', 3: 'What a surprise to find you before me... Have you defeated those feeble Generals of the East, South, and West?', 4: '2'}
{2: "Sounds like your event isn't very balanced.", 3: '6', 4: "You're all that's left.", 5: '7'}
{2: 'North General', 3: "Huh, balanced? You've seen nothing when all you've done is solving riddles.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'North General', 3: "Such arrogance, outsiders! Don't think for a moment that I am anything like them!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'I take that your trial is going to be fairly difficult?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'North General', 3: 'Now, given that our contestants have arrived, let me explain the Northern trial.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'North General', 3: 'Sure, one might use talisman or spells when encountering ghosts and monsters, but during the critical moments, all that will save you is your actual prowess.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'North General', 3: 'Your trial is simpleâ€”defeat my men!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'How many of us do we send in?', 3: '13', 4: 'Any restriction?', 5: '14'}
{2: 'North General', 3: 'You can all join in if you wish.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'North General', 3: 'We can save that for later. What you should know is that all of you can join this fight.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Right! Just like how we always fight!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'North General', 3: 'Let the trial begin! Scene change!', 4: '1'}
